content.content: It would be awsome to have a section for new people to learn the basics.Thank you for your time.

Yea, I just had 2 transactions where i was charged a fee and the transactions never took place. Where do i go for help with that. Small transactions (.25 eth) but Txhash shows charging the fees and a successful transaction of 0 eth. If the tx fee is gone, thats whatever, but now im afraid to use uniswap cause i just got fooled twice.

jwall:  Where do i go for help with that.   There is an active community support team on the Uniswap Discord server. I agree that it would be beneficial to have better directions on how to contact them, or another support avenue altogether (email, section of this forum, etc.) for users as well.    Discord    Join the Uniswap Discord Server! Uniswap is a decentralized protocol for trading and automated liquidity provision on Ethereum! | 65,744 members

I am working with the uniswap grants program to make docs and learning resources more accessible for now i find that youtube resources like defi-dad and zapper > learn to be very helpful for the basics good luck! - dm me on twitter if you have any questions https://twitter.com/uniswapgrants?s=21
Seems like this link (and the one on the homepage) is expired. Could the Uniswap team update the link?

I have the same issue. I didn’t receive any tokens and just ended paying transaction fees. This an example tx   0x72d4757909edcd21f65820ebb22d5fcf141c9cb35659ea93e3e8d0bcdffa0370 Anyone can help, pls? Thanks
